steps.205: pat-pat rinsed mushrooms dry with a paper towel
steps.207: cook-cook the pan, often stirring, for 1 minute
steps.208: add-Once the pan is hot, add the mushrooms
steps.209: Add-Add chopped shallot to the pan
steps.213: cook-cook for 3-5 minutes, stirring often, until mushrooms start to soften and brown
steps.215: Heat-Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
steps.216: Transfer-Transfer the contents of the pan to a serving dish
steps.217: Add-1/4 tbsp balsamic vinegar to the pan
steps.218: Add-Add 2 cloves of minced garlic to the pan
